text: This is a list of famous Chinese painters. ==Previous millennium== *Mi Fu (d. 1107) *Qi Baishi (d. 1957) ==New millenium== *Wang Guozhen (d. 2015) *Jao Tsung-I (d. 2018) *Ho Kan (1932-) *Gao Xingjian (1940-), Chinese-French writer, painter *Liu Xia (1961-) ==References== * Category:Lists of painters
title: List of Chinese painters
